name: Fixed Widget Area
author: biztechc

sections.description:
1. This plugin fixes admin sidebar widget area while scrolling.so admin can drag widget easily to respective area without moving up and down.
  2. If sidebar widget area height increases window height,then fixed property of widget area get removed and it allows now to scroll and add widgets in bottom area.
  3. It freezes the right side widget area for easy installation of dragged widgets.
  4. It is easy to activate this widget.
sections.installation:
1. Copy the entire /fixed-widget-area/ directory into your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin.
  3. Check your widgets page in admin.
sections.faq: 1.Is this plugin prepared for multisites? – Yes.
